featured.text: By the early 19th century, four-tined forks had also been developed in Germany and England and slowly began to spread to America.

definition.zh_def: 錫，一種金屬元素，符號為Sn，常用於製造合金和包裝材料。
definition.en_def: Tin, a metallic element with the symbol Sn, commonly used in alloys and packaging materials.
definition.example: The can is made of tin to prevent rusting.
